text:
Need Hayden Bell for Witchery campaign. Budget around $6,559, looking for 1 x Instagram story, 1 x YouTube short, 2 x Live stream. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 2 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $6,559 budget

Need to confirm: exclusivity period
